Test Name: Total Eosinophil Count (TEA) and Immunoglobulin E (IgE)
Specimen Type: Whole blood (for TEA) and serum (for IgE/serum analyses)
Purpose: To quantify eosinophil count and immunoglobulin E levels in patient samples for clinical diagnosis and monitoring.
Container: EDTA tube for TEA; Serum separator tube (SST) for IgE and serum analyses
Equipment: Automated hematology analyzer, immunoassay analyzer, centrifuge
